name: Stallone - Nino Limited Edition - Corona Grande
additionalNotes: Established in 2014, Stallone Cigars were created and are blended by Tony Barrios. Barrios’ love for horses, imparted from his grandfather, inspired the name Stallone Cigars, stallion in Italian.
